title: mc_tasks::force::ImpedanceTask
description: This task is similar to AdmittanceTask and DampingTask. Unlike those, the robot can adapt to an external force while following a target pose.

impedanceM.description: Impedance mass parameter represented in the controlled surface

impedanceD.description: Impedance damper parameter represetnted in the controlled surface

impedanceK.description: Impedance spring parameter repesented in the controlled surface

wrenchGain.description: Coefficient-wise gain on the wrench error
